properties.address: Tal y Bont Memorial Hall, Tal y Bont, SY24 5DY
properties.contact: Catrin M S DaviesYouth Club - Lowri Evans: catrin.m.s.davies@ceredigion.llyw.cymru lowri_masonevans@hotmail.com
properties.description:
Wednesdays: A Warm Welcome Space in Ystafell Waelod. Hot Drinks and biscuits available. Everyone is welcome including children. There are some toys, games and colouring books for children.
Fridays: Youth club for 10 -16 year olds.

hours._text:
Wednesdays: 13:30 - 17:00
Youth club during term time, Friday 18:30 - 20:30

properties.name: Tal y Bont Youth Club

properties.address:
Cletwr Cafe
Tre'r Ddol,
Ceredigion,
SY20 8PN
properties.description:
A warm welcome space in Cletwr café. Visitors can be reassured that they will be provided a space to sit, undisturbed in our cafe area surrounded by a safe and friendly atmosphere, with staff on hand to
assist with any additional needs. Plug sockets available, visitors are welcome to browse the second hand book section.
properties.name: Cletwr Cafe
